title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully register and log in with valid credentials using Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page.
Register a new user with valid email and strong password.
Registration is successful and user is redirected to login page.
Log in using the newly registered credentials.
User is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard page.

title: User Authentication Failure
description: Verify that the system prevents login with incorrect credentials and provides appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Attempt login with incorrect email and/or password.
Login is denied and error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that access to protected routes and features is restricted based on user authentication status and subscription plan.

steps.description: Attempt to access dashboard page without logging in.
User is redirected to login page.
Log in as a user with Basic plan.
Attempt to access Business and Premium features (e.g. support tickets, backups, sub-agent usage).
Access to features not included in plan is denied with appropriate message.

title: Financial Record Creation and Categorization
description: Test creation, editing, and deletion of financial records with correct categorization and data validation.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Financial Management page.
Create a new income record with required fields and select correct category.
New income record appears in the list with correct data.
Edit the created record's amount to an invalid negative value.
Validation error is shown preventing invalid amount.
Edit the created record's category.
Changes save successfully and updated info is displayed.
Delete the financial record.
Record is removed from the list and confirmation is shown.

title: Duplicate Financial Record Detection
description: Verify that the system detects and warns about duplicate financial records upon creation.

steps.description: Navigate to Financial Management page and add a record with specific details.
Attempt to add another financial record with the same date, amount, and category.
Duplicate warning is shown preventing accidental duplicate entries.

title: Data Export Functionality for Paid Plans
description: Validate data export feature is accessible only to paid plan users and supports CSV, JSON, and PDF formats with filters.

steps.description: Log in as Basic plan user and navigate to Reports page.
Attempt to access export functionality.
Export option is disabled or access denied with message to upgrade plan.
Log in as Business or Premium plan user.
Navigate to Reports page, apply date and category filters.
Export data in CSV, JSON, and PDF formats.
Exported files contain filtered data and open correctly in respective applications.

title: Google Workspace Integration for Calendar and Tasks
description: Test optional integration with Google Workspace for syncing calendar events, tasks, and drive files.

steps.description: Log in and enable Google Workspace integration in settings.
Create events and tasks within Meu Agente application.
Created events and tasks appear in linked Google Calendar and Tasks.
Create new events and tasks directly in Google Workspace.
Events and tasks synchronize and appear within Meu Agente interface.
Disable Google Workspace integration.
No further synchronization occurs and user is informed.

title: WhatsApp Command Processing and AI Agent Interaction
description: Verify execution of commands sent via WhatsApp to AI agents for financial recording, scheduling, and marketing tasks.

steps.description: Send natural language command via WhatsApp to create a financial entry.
Financial record is registered correctly in the system.
Send command to AI SDR agent to qualify a lead and schedule a meeting.
Lead is added and meeting is scheduled successfully in Google Calendar.
Send command to AI Marketing agent to analyze recent campaign.
Agent returns analysis and improvement suggestions.
Send invalid or malformed command.
Agent responds with error message indicating command not understood.

title: Sub-Agents Access Control and Feature Availability
description: Verify that sub-agents are available only to users with appropriate plans and permissions.

steps.description: Log in as Basic plan user.
Attempt to invoke Premium sub-agents such as Remarketing or Follow-up via WhatsApp or UI.
Access is denied with message indicating upgrade requirement.
Log in as Premium plan user.
Invoke all available sub-agents.
All sub-agents execute commands correctly and return expected results.

title: Support Ticket System for Business and Premium Plans
description: Verify that support tickets can be created and managed only by Business and Premium plan users with 24/7 priority support.

steps.description: Log in as Basic plan user and access support system.
Access to premium support ticket creation is restricted or disabled.
Log in as Business or Premium plan user.
Create a new support ticket describing an issue.
Ticket is created successfully and user receives confirmation with ticket ID.
View list of submitted tickets and reply to support messages.
Ticket statuses update properly and communication is logged.

title: Daily Off-site Backup and Restore for Premium Plan
description: Confirm that daily backups are created off-site and that restore functionality works properly for Premium plan users.

steps.description: Log in as Premium plan user.
Request backup status.
Confirmation is returned showing latest backup date and integrity check.
Trigger restore of backup.
System restores data to backup state without data loss or corruption.
Log in as Business or Basic user.
Backup and restore features are not available or disabled.

title: Scraping Data From Authorized Sources Only
description: Test that the scraping agent extracts data exclusively from permitted sources and approved APIs according to policy.

steps.description: Send scraping request to agent with URL of allowed source.
Data is extracted and returned correctly.
Send scraping request with unauthorized or blocked source URL.
Request is denied with security warning and no data is extracted.

title: Performance Monitoring and Responsiveness
description: Validate that performance monitoring is active and that the UI remains responsive under peak load conditions.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users performing actions including data entry, queries, and navigation.
Performance metrics are logged and system maintains acceptable response times without errors.
Alerts or logs indicate any performance degradation clearly.

title: Validation of WhatsApp Proactive Message Authorization
description: Ensure that the system enforces WhatsApp template policies and opt-in requirements for proactive notifications.

steps.description: Attempt to send proactive WhatsApp message with unauthorized template.
Message is rejected according to WhatsApp rules and error is logged.
Send proactive message to user without opt-in consent.
Message is blocked and compliance warning is generated.
Send proactive message using approved template to opted-in user.
Message is sent successfully and logged for audit.

title: Security Checks: CSRF, Input Sanitization and Validation
description: Verify that all forms and endpoints include CSRF protection, proper data sanitization, and validation to prevent injection attacks and data corruption.

steps.description: Submit forms with malicious scripts or invalid data.
Input is sanitized and rejected if invalid; no scripts are executed.
Perform API requests without valid CSRF tokens.
Requests fail with appropriate CSRF error.

title: Responsive and Accessible UI Testing
description: Confirm interface is responsive across devices and screen sizes and meets accessibility standards using React, TailwindCSS, and Radix UI components.

steps.description: Open application on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
UI elements adjust layout properly without content overlap or cutoff.
Navigate all interactive components using keyboard only.
Keyboard focus is clearly visible and all controls are operable.
Use screen reader to navigate key pages.
Screen reader announces UI components appropriately.

title: Theme Switch and Persistence
description: Verify the theme management system correctly toggles between light and dark modes and persists user preference.

steps.description: Access theme switch control.
Toggle between light and dark modes.
UI updates styling accordingly with immediate effect.
Reload the page or log out and back in.
Selected theme preference is retained and applied.

title: Notification System Alerts and Real-time Updates
description: Check that notifications and alerts appear in real-time and can be dismissed or acted upon by the user.

steps.description: Trigger notification scenarios such as new support ticket response or upcoming event reminder.
Notification appears promptly in notification bell dropdown with accurate information.
Dismiss a notification.
Notification disappears from list without reappearing unless new.
